summary: Two unlikely high-school friends share a common passion for computer hacking. Problems arise when their abilities are noticed by a group of gangsters.
cast: Bartosz Obuchowicz|Kasia Smutniak|Boguslaw Linda|Marek Kondrat|Wojciech Blach|Anna Brusewicz|Krzysztof Czeczot|Tomasz Dedek|Pawel Delag|Zbigniew Dziduch|Paul Freeman|Marian Glinka|Maria Kaniewska|Joanna Król|Piotr Miazga|Aleksander Mikolajczak|Cezary Morawski|Maciej Orlos|Numa Perrier|Wojciech Skibinski|Magdalena Smalara|Pawel Wilczak|Anna Wojton|Janusz Zaorski|Dorota Zieciowska|Leslie Galbraith
title: Haker
